bookings.title: Booking Management System
bookings.description: JSON Schema for booking management system entities

booking_id.description: Primary key identifier for the booking

appointment_length.description: Length of the appointment in minutes

full_duration.description: Full duration of the booking in minutes

notes.description: Notes about the booking with minimum 400 character capacity

num_volunteers_needed.description: Number of volunteers needed for this booking

client_confirmation.description: Whether the client has confirmed the booking

is_parent_booking.description: Whether this is a parent booking for recurring bookings

parent_booking_id.description: Foreign key reference to parent booking, nullable

end_date.description: End date for recurring bookings, nullable

destination_address_description.description: Description of the destination address, nullable

destination_address_street.description: Street of the destination address, nullable

destination_address_city.description: City of the destination address, nullable

client_id.description: Primary key identifier for the client

scent_sensitivity.description: Whether the client has scent sensitivity

volunteer_id.description: Primary key identifier for the volunteer

car_type.description: Type of car the volunteer drives

scent_sensitivity.description: Whether the volunteer has scent sensitivity

is_primary.description: Whether this client is the primary client for the booking

status.description: Status of the volunteer for this booking

user_id.description: Foreign key reference to User, nullable for external attendees

external_name.description: Name of external attendee, nullable for system users

user_type.description: Type of user attending the event

absence_id.description: Primary key identifier for the absence

is_one_day.description: Whether the absence is for a single day

history_id.description: Primary key identifier for the history entry

user_id.description: Foreign key reference to database user

action.description: Text description of the action taken

donations.title: Donation Management System
donations.description: JSON Schema for donation management system entities

donation_id.description: Primary key identifier for the donation

donation_amount.description: Amount of the donation with precision to cents

eligible_amount.description: Eligible amount for tax purposes, defaults to donation_amount

receipt_sent_date.description: Date when receipt was sent, nullable

received_date.description: Date when donation was received, defaults to current date

processed_date.description: Date when donation was processed, defaults to current date

deposit_date.description: Date when donation was deposited, defaults to current date

notes.description: Additional notes about the donation, optional

created_at.description: Timestamp when the donation record was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the donation record was last updated

created_by.description: Foreign key reference to User who created the record

updated_by.description: Foreign key reference to User who last updated the record

donor_id.description: Primary key identifier for the donor

first_name.description: First name of the donor, for individuals

last_name.description: Last name of the donor, for individuals

organization_name.description: Name of the organization, for organizations

address_postal_code.description: Postal/zip code of the donor's address

tax_receipt_address.description: Indicates if address can be used for tax receipts

is_anonymous.description: Indicates if the donor wishes to remain anonymous

donation_history_summary.description: Virtual field - calculated summary of donation history

created_at.description: Timestamp when the donor record was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the donor record was last updated

receipt_id.description: Primary key identifier for the receipt

issue_date.description: Date when the receipt was issued

sent_date.description: Date when the receipt was sent, nullable

sent_method.description: Method used to send the receipt

pdf_file_path.description: Path to the stored receipt PDF file

events.title: Event Management System
events.description: JSON Schema for event management system entities

event_id.description: Primary key identifier for the event

end_date.description: End date of the event, null for single-day events

max_attendees.description: Maximum number of attendees, null if unlimited

max_volunteers.description: Maximum number of volunteers, null if unlimited

is_recurring.description: Whether this is a recurring event

recurrence_pattern.description: JSON object defining the recurrence pattern, null for non-recurring events

registration_required.description: Whether registration is required for this event

registration_deadline.description: Deadline for registration, null if no deadline

registration_url.description: URL for external registration, null if not applicable

contact_person.description: Name of the contact person for the event

contact_phone.description: Phone number of the contact person

created_at.description: Timestamp when the event was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the event was last updated

created_by.description: Foreign key reference to the user who created the event

fiscal_year.description: Fiscal year of the event (calculated field based on start_date)

category_id.description: Primary key identifier for the category

parent_category_id.description: Foreign key reference to parent category, null for top-level categories

display_order.description: Order in which to display this category

attendee_id.description: Primary key identifier for the attendee record

event_id.description: Foreign key reference to the event

user_id.description: Foreign key reference to the user, null for external attendees

first_name.description: First name of the attendee (for external attendees)

last_name.description: Last name of the attendee (for external attendees)

email.description: Email of the attendee, null if not provided

phone.description: Phone number of the attendee, null if not provided

check_in_time.description: Time when the attendee checked in, null if not checked in

check_out_time.description: Time when the attendee checked out, null if not checked out

special_needs.description: Special needs or accommodations required by the attendee

is_external.description: Whether this is an external attendee (not in the system)

volunteer_assignment_id.description: Primary key identifier for the volunteer assignment

event_id.description: Foreign key reference to the event

volunteer_id.description: Foreign key reference to the volunteer user

role.description: Role of the volunteer at the event

start_time.description: Start time of the volunteer's shift

end_time.description: End time of the volunteer's shift

hours_worked.description: Hours worked by the volunteer (calculated or manually entered)

notes.description: Additional notes about the volunteer assignment

task_id.description: Primary key identifier for the task

event_id.description: Foreign key reference to the event

assigned_to.description: Foreign key reference to the assigned user, null if unassigned

resource_id.description: Primary key identifier for the resource

event_id.description: Foreign key reference to the event

file_path.description: Path to the resource file, null if not applicable

url.description: URL of the resource, null if not applicable

is_public.description: Whether the resource is publicly accessible

upload_date.description: Timestamp when the resource was uploaded

uploaded_by.description: Foreign key reference to the user who uploaded the resource

feedback_id.description: Primary key identifier for the feedback

event_id.description: Foreign key reference to the event

user_id.description: Foreign key reference to the user, null for anonymous feedback

submission_date.description: Timestamp when the feedback was submitted

event_id.description: Foreign key reference to the event

category_id.description: Foreign key reference to the event category

homepage.title: Homepage Components Schema
homepage.description: JSON Schema for the homepage components including Journal, UpcomingJobs, and Navigation

journal_entry_id.description: Primary key for the journal entry

author_id.description: Foreign key to the User who created the entry

creation_date.description: Timestamp when the entry was created

last_edited_date.description: Timestamp when the entry was last edited

last_edited_by.description: Foreign key to the User who last edited the entry

importance_level.description: Importance level of the journal entry

is_pinned.description: Whether the entry is pinned to the top

visibility.description: Who can see this journal entry

tags.description: Tags associated with the journal entry

file_size.description: Size of the file in bytes

comments_enabled.description: Whether comments are enabled for this entry

journal_entry_id.description: Foreign key to the Journal entry

author_id.description: Foreign key to the User who created the comment

creation_date.description: Timestamp when the comment was created

last_edited_date.description: Timestamp when the comment was last edited

is_deleted.description: Whether the comment has been deleted

volunteer_name.description: Name of the volunteer, if assigned

duration.description: Duration of the job in minutes

is_assigned.description: Whether the job is assigned to a volunteer

days_until.description: Number of days until the job

priority_level.description: Priority level calculated based on assignment status and proximity

menu_item_id.description: Primary key for the menu item

name.description: Internal name of the menu item

display_name.description: Display name of the menu item

parent_id.description: Foreign key to parent menu item for nested menus

order.description: Display order of the menu item

is_visible.description: Whether the menu item is visible

required_permissions.description: Permissions required to see this menu item

badge_counter_source.description: Reference to counter function for badge display

link_id.description: Primary key for the quick link

is_system.description: Whether this is a system-defined link

created_by.description: Foreign key to the User who created the link

visible_to_roles.description: Roles that can see this quick link

order.description: Display order of the quick link

visible_to_roles.description: Roles that can see this stat

notifications.title: Core Notification Components
notifications.description: JSON Schema for notification system components

notification_type_id.description: Primary key identifier for the notification type

name.description: Name of the notification type (e.g., 'CRC Renewal', 'Driver Abstract Renewal')

description.description: Detailed description of the notification type

icon.description: Path to the icon file representing this notification type

color_code.description: Hex color code for visual representation

is_active.description: Whether this notification type is currently active

affects_booking.description: Whether this notification affects booking capabilities

affected_services.description: Array of service codes affected by this notification

auto_status_change.description: Whether this notification automatically changes user status

new_status.description: New status to set when auto_status_change is true

created_at.description: Timestamp when this notification type was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when this notification type was last updated

template_id.description: Primary key identifier for the template

body_text.description: Plain text version of the notification content

body_html.description: HTML formatted version of the notification content

delivery_method.description: Method(s) used to deliver this notification

is_default.description: Whether this is the default template for its notification type

created_at.description: Timestamp when this template was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when this template was last updated

rule_id.description: Primary key identifier for the rule

trigger_type.description: Type of trigger that activates this rule

trigger_value.description: Value associated with the trigger (e.g., number of days/weeks)

trigger_unit.description: Unit of time for the trigger value

recipient_type.description: Type of recipient for the notification

custom_recipients.description: Array of user IDs or roles for custom recipients

is_recurring.description: Whether this notification recurs multiple times

recurrence_unit.description: Unit of time for recurrence interval

max_recurrences.description: Maximum number of times this notification should recur

is_active.description: Whether this rule is currently active

created_at.description: Timestamp when this rule was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when this rule was last updated

notification_id.description: Primary key identifier for the notification instance

user_id.description: Foreign key reference to User, nullable for system notifications

related_entity_type.description: Type of entity this notification relates to (e.g., 'Credential', 'Booking')

scheduled_time.description: Time when this notification is scheduled to be sent

sent_time.description: Time when this notification was actually sent

acknowledged_time.description: Time when this notification was acknowledged

acknowledged_by.description: User ID of who acknowledged the notification

delivery_method.description: Method used to deliver this notification

delivery_details.description: Details about the delivery (e.g., email address, phone number)

next_retry_time.description: Time for the next retry attempt

created_at.description: Timestamp when this notification instance was created

preference_id.description: Primary key identifier for the preference

notification_type_id.description: Foreign key reference to NotificationType, null for global preferences

is_enabled.description: Whether notifications of this type are enabled for this user

created_at.description: Timestamp when this preference was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when this preference was last updated

credential_id.description: Primary key identifier for the credential

issue_date.description: Date when the credential was issued

document_path.description: Path to the stored credential document

created_at.description: Timestamp when this credential was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when this credential was last updated

created_by.description: User ID of who created this credential record

updated_by.description: User ID of who last updated this credential record

programs.title: Program Management System
programs.description: JSON Schema for program management system entities

program_id.description: Primary key identifier for the program

code.description: Unique identifier code for the program

end_date.description: Date when the program ended, null for ongoing programs

coordinator_id.description: Foreign key reference to the program coordinator

contact_phone.description: Contact phone number for the program

created_at.description: Timestamp when the program was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the program was last updated

created_by.description: Foreign key reference to the user who created the program

has_events.description: Whether this program has associated events

has_bookings.description: Whether this program has associated bookings

has_map_function.description: Whether this program uses the map function

participant_id.description: Primary key identifier for the participant

program_id.description: Foreign key reference to the program

user_id.description: Foreign key reference to the user

role.description: Role of the participant in the program

start_date.description: Date when the participant started in the program

end_date.description: Date when the participant ended in the program, null for active participants

created_at.description: Timestamp when the participant record was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the participant record was last updated

booking_id.description: Foreign key reference to the booking

program_id.description: Foreign key reference to the program

duration_hours.description: Duration of the booking in hours

client_id.description: Foreign key reference to the client

volunteer_id.description: Foreign key reference to the volunteer

fiscal_year.description: Fiscal year of the booking (calculated field)

event_id.description: Foreign key reference to the event

program_id.description: Foreign key reference to the program

attendance_count.description: Number of attendees at the event

volunteer_count.description: Number of volunteers at the event

duration_hours.description: Duration of the event in hours

fiscal_year.description: Fiscal year of the event (calculated field)

resource_id.description: Primary key identifier for the resource

program_id.description: Foreign key reference to the program

file_path.description: Path to the resource file, null if not applicable

url.description: URL of the resource, null if not applicable

is_public.description: Whether the resource is publicly accessible

upload_date.description: Timestamp when the resource was uploaded

uploaded_by.description: Foreign key reference to the user who uploaded the resource

metric_id.description: Primary key identifier for the metric

program_id.description: Foreign key reference to the program

calculation_date.description: Timestamp when the metric was calculated

activity_id.description: Primary key identifier for the activity

ambassador_id.description: Foreign key reference to the ambassador user

event_id.description: Foreign key reference to the event

role.description: Role of the ambassador at the event

fiscal_year.description: Fiscal year of the activity (calculated field)

pet_id.description: Primary key identifier for the pet

image_path.description: Path to the pet's image, null if not available

acquisition_date.description: Date when the pet was acquired

assignment_id.description: Primary key identifier for the assignment

pet_id.description: Foreign key reference to the pet

client_id.description: Foreign key reference to the client

end_date.description: Date when the assignment ended, null for current assignments

fiscal_year.description: Fiscal year of the assignment (calculated field)

event_id.description: Foreign key reference to the event

location_id.description: Primary key identifier for the location

client_id.description: Foreign key reference to the client

is_active.description: Whether the location is currently active

bah_id.description: Primary key identifier for the Better at Home client

client_id.description: Foreign key reference to the client user

first_service_date.description: Date of first service, null if not yet served

end_service_date.description: Date of service termination, null if still active

program_id.description: Foreign key reference to the program

client_count.description: Count of clients, excluding Better at Home (calculated)

total_program_clients.description: Total program clients, excluding Better at Home (calculated)

reports.title: Core Reporting Components
reports.description: JSON Schema for reporting system components

report_id.description: Primary key identifier for the report definition

query_definition.description: JSON object defining the report query logic

default_sort_field.description: Default field to sort results by

permissions_required.description: Array of permission strings required to access this report

is_system.description: Indicates if it's a predefined system report

created_by.description: Foreign key to User who created the report

created_at.description: Timestamp when the report was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the report was last updated

parameter_id.description: Primary key identifier for the parameter

options.description: JSON array of options for dropdowns/multiselect

display_order.description: Order in which to display this parameter

column_id.description: Primary key identifier for the column

is_visible.description: Whether this column is visible in the report

is_sortable.description: Whether this column can be sorted

is_filterable.description: Whether this column can be filtered

link_field.description: Field to use as link parameter

display_order.description: Order in which to display this column

saved_report_id.description: Primary key identifier for the saved report

user_id.description: Foreign key to User who saved the report

created_at.description: Timestamp when the report was saved

last_run.description: Timestamp when the report was last run

is_favorite.description: Whether this is a favorite report

schedule_id.description: Primary key identifier for the schedule

day_of_week.description: Day of week (1-7) for weekly schedules

day_of_month.description: Day of month (1-31) for monthly schedules

time.description: Time of day for the schedule

last_run.description: Timestamp when the schedule was last run

next_run.description: Timestamp for the next scheduled run

execution_id.description: Primary key identifier for the execution

user_id.description: Foreign key to User who executed the report

row_count.description: Number of rows in the result

view_type.description: Type of view for the report

as_of_date.description: Date for which to generate the report

counts_by_type_status.description: Count by user type and status

as_of_date.description: Date for which to generate the report

include_bah.description: Whether to include Better at Home clients

as_of_date.description: Date for which to generate the report
Date for which to generate the report

parameters.description: Additional parameters specific to this report type

columns.description: Columns specific to this report type

custom_filters.description: Custom filters for the mailing list

template_id.description: Primary key identifier for the template

custom_report_id.description: Primary key identifier for the custom report

user_id.description: Foreign key to User who created the report

created_at.description: Timestamp when the report was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the report was last updated

searches.title: Search System Components
searches.description: JSON Schema for search functionality components

search_id.description: Primary key identifier for the search configuration

default_sort_field.description: Default field to sort results by

results_per_page.description: Number of results to display per page, defaults based on search type

search_fields.description: JSON array of field configurations for search form

result_fields.description: JSON array of field configurations for results display

permissions_required.description: Array of permission strings required to access this search

tab_id.description: Primary key identifier for the search tab

search_type.description: Type of search this tab belongs to

tab_order.description: Order in which to display this tab

filter_criteria.description: JSON object of default filters for this tab

visible_to_roles.description: Array of role strings that can see this tab

field_id.description: Primary key identifier for the search field

search_type.description: Array of search types where this field is used

search_tabs.description: Array of tab IDs where this field appears

is_default.description: Whether this field is included in the default search form

default_value.description: Default value for the field, nullable

options.description: JSON array of options for dropdowns/multiselect

search_behavior.description: How the search should match this field

field_id.description: Primary key identifier for the result field

search_type.description: Array of search types where this field is used

search_tabs.description: Array of tab IDs where this field appears

is_sortable.description: Whether this field can be sorted

is_filterable.description: Whether this field can be filtered

is_editable.description: Whether this field can be edited inline

edit_permissions.description: Array of permission strings required to edit this field

saved_search_id.description: Primary key identifier for the saved search

is_default.description: Whether this is the default search for this user and type

created_at.description: Timestamp when the search was saved

last_used.description: Timestamp when the search was last used

tab_name.description: Name of the user search tab

common.description: Common search fields for all user types

UserSearchFields.description: Search fields for different user types

health_condition_type: Add More button (adds additional Other checkboxes with fillable boxes)

accessibility_need_type: Immunocompromised - Requests that you wear a mask
Add More button (adds additional Other checkboxes with fillable boxes)

arrangement_type: Lives Communally in Low-Income Housing Facility
Lives Communally in Seniors Retirement Facility
Lives with a Roommate/Partner in House
Lives with a Roommate/Partner in Apartment/Condo
